title: How Would You Know
lyrics:
I want you in the wrong way
What's tomorrow if you've got today
And if you subscribe to my way
You erase all of this anyway
Out in the mountainss and granola
That lies a little bit east of all ya

-

Hold out your hands

Oh such little hands

Lie to your man

Stay wise to the plan

-

'Cept drivin makes no sense

Since I don't even have a license

And we could walk and get as far

It just might take a little bit longer

There's your dealer on the corner

Just giving himself a boner

-

Hold out your hands

Stay wise to the plan

-

(chorus)

Cuz what you got is what you need

Here then I don't wanna hear the rest

And if you ever had a thing to sell

Then you know what you got

-

Why would you care

If it's everywhere

And dont leave me here

I'm always alone

But how would you know?

-

I fall down the shaft

Nothing to grab

On to pull me up



Just like long ago



But how would you know?

-

How would you know?

-

So you need me for the wrong things

But now you've got yourself a bird who sings

And you left me for your owner

And the mountains and granola

-



So hold out your hands

Oh such little hands

-

(chorus)



If what you got is what you need

Here then I don't wanna hear the rest

And if you ever had a thing to sell

Then get rid of the lie

-



If what you got is what you need

Here then I don't wanna hear the rest

And everybody's got a thing to sell

I don't need what you got
